item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
You know Blackberry's keyboard is small ... it's even small to me though I have slim fingers :D
It is proved that 100% blog entries from my Blackberry need correction, all sort of problems caused by small keyboard - "i" and "o", "m" and "n", get to pay more attention from now.
item.content:encoded:
You know Blackberry’s keyboard is small … it’s even small to me though I have slim fingers ðŸ˜€

It is proved that 100% blog entries from my Blackberry need correction, all sort of problems caused by small keyboard – “i” and “o”, “m” and “n”, get to pay more attention from now.
